SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.dashboard

Klasse AverageRatingStatisticController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.dashboard.AverageRatingStatisticController
public class AverageRatingStatisticController extends Object
Controller for managing the display of watch state statistics in the dashboard. Handles the visualization of counts for different watch states (finished, watching, dropped, to watch) using a custom statistic view.

This controller works in conjunction with the StateCountStatisticView FXML file to display the statistics for various states of the cinematics (e.g., finished, watching, dropped, to watch). The states are calculated using a strategy pattern and displayed in the dashboard.

Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut
Siehe auch:

  • StateCount

    • addAverageRatingStatistic

      public void addAverageRatingStatistic(List<Cinematic> cinematics, List<Type> types, List<State> states) throws IOException
      Adds the average rating statistic to the dashboard.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - The list of cinematics to analyze.
      types - The list of types to filter (e.g., Movie, Anime, Series).
      states - The list of states to filter (e.g., Watched, Dropped).
      Löst aus:
      IOException - If the FXML file cannot be loaded.
